title: Airion
description: Have you ever felt like you had a mission in life? Carrie always knew that she had a special mission in her life, but she had no idea what accepting that mission would mean. In this supernatural thriller Carrie uses her psychic abilities to help those suffering deep personal pain and to guide young witches. She thought this was her mission. She was wrong. A spiritual leader who attained his position through a pact with a dark entity wants to control the energy flowing through Carrie's workplace. She finds herself ensnared in a battle that could cost her more than her life. And after meeting her soul mate that is a price Carrie will not pay without a fight.
author: L.M. Halls
